item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Seventeen - Always Yours (Japanese Best album) [Amazon Music FLAC 24bits/48kHz]
item.description:
Always Yours (stylized in all caps) is the first Japanese best album by SEVENTEEN. It was released on August 23, 2023 with "Ima -Even If the World Ends Tomorrow-" serving as the album's title track.



Track list
Disc 1
  1. "Ima -Even If the World Ends Tomorrow- (今 -明日 世界が終わっても-)" - 3:11
  2. "Sara Sara" - 2:57
  3. "Call Call Call!" - 3:19
  4. "Happy Ending" - 3:31
  5. "Fallin' Flower (舞い落ちる花びら)" - 3:32
  6. "24H" - 3:09
  7. "Not Alone (ひとりじゃない)" - 3:18
  8. "Power of Love (あいのちから)" - 3:50
  9. "Dream" - 3:06
Disc 2
  1. "Highlight -Japanese ver.-" - 3:46
  2. "Lead On Me -Japanese ver.-" - 3:25
  3. "20 -Japanese ver.-" - 3:23
  4. "Love Letter -Japanese ver.-" - 2:59
  5. "Oh My! -Japanese ver.-" - 3:16
  6. "Healing -Japanese ver.-" - 3:25
  7. "Good to Me -Japanese ver.-" - 3:11
  8. "Smile Flower -Japanese ver.-" - 3:52
  9. "Pinwheel -Japanese ver.-" - 3:41
  10. "247 -Japanese ver.-" - 3:34
  11. "Chili -Japanese ver.-" - 3:06
  12. "Together -Japanese ver.-" - 4:04
  13. "Run to You -Japanese ver.-" - 3:14
  14. "Home;Run -Japanese ver.-" - 3:04
  15. "Home -Japanese ver.-" - 3:25
  16. "Snap Shoot -Japanese ver.-" - 2:54
  17. "Rock with you -Japanese ver.-" - 3:00
  18. "All My Love -Japanese ver.-" - 3:22
Some tracks are in 16bits/44.1kHz
